qas.question: As of 2013, who was the Marshall Islands Minister of Foreign Affairs?
In what month and year did the 44th Pacific Islands Forum summit take place?
What document did Foreign Minister de Brum present at the 44th Pacific Islands Forum summit?
What environmental issue did the Majuro Declaration for Climate Leadership address?
Who encouraged de Brum to address climate issues?

context: Following the 2013 emergencies, the Minister of Foreign Affairs <a0_0>Tony de Brum<a0_0/> was encouraged by <a4_0>the Obama administration<a4_0/> in the United States to turn the crises into an opportunity to promote action against climate change. De Brum demanded new commitment and international leadership to stave off further climate disasters from battering his country and other similarly vulnerable countries. In <a1_0>September 2013<a1_0/>, the Marshall Islands hosted the 44th Pacific Islands Forum summit. De Brum proposed a <a2_0>Majuro Declaration for Climate Leadership<a2_0/> to galvanize concrete action on <a3_0>climate change<a3_0/>.
